title: Farhan Sadeek
text: Welcome to my website. I am a high school student at Dublin Coffman High School and dual enrolled at the The Ohio State University. I am interested in mathematics, physics, computer science, and electrical engineering. During high school I participated in mathematics, physics, chemistry and informatics olympiads. You can find my resume here.

title: Farhan Sadeek
text:
Papers and Publications

Predicting Market States and Optimizing Investment Strategies: A Machine Learning Approach
Authors: Jalen Francis, Farhan Sadeek, Jayson Clark, Aditya Bhati, Andrew McKenzie
Abstract: This research presents a machine learning-based system for predicting market states and optimizing investment strategies using S&P 500 data from 2008-2022. The system classifies market periods as Bull, Bear, or Static, and employs ensemble and deep learning models to forecast future conditions, dynamically allocating assets between equities and bonds. The Combined Anomaly-Regime strategy achieved a 56.34% total return with better risk-adjusted performance compared to a buy-and-hold approach. You can find the paper here.
SignifyAI: Enhancing Communication for the Deaf and Hard of Hearing through ASL Spelling and Gesture Detection
Authors: Jalen Francis, Farhan Sadeek, Jayson Clark
Abstract: This research introduces a real-time system to enhance communication for deaf or hard of hearing individuals by integrating ASL gesture recognition and facial emotion detection. Using deep learning models, the system translates ASL finger-spelling into text, recognizes hand gestures, and detects facial expressions to convey emotions and grammatical nuances. The solution aims to improve accessibility and inclusivity in educational, professional, and social settings, as demonstrated by user studies and performance metrics. You can find the paper here.

title: Farhan Sadeek

Teaching
During the sprign 2025 semester, I was a teaching assistant for CSE 2231: Software Development and Design at The Ohio State University. You can find some content from that class here.

title: Farhan Sadeek
text:
Coursework and Personal Notes
During my time at Ohio State, I took some mathematics, physics, computer Science and Electrical Engineering class at Ohio State. Here are those courses:

Mathematics

Math 4547: Real Analysis
Math 4580: Abstract Algebra
Math 4573: Number Theory
Math 4575: Combinatorics (Audit)
Math 4512: Partial Differential Equations
Math 3345: Mathematical Proofs
Math 2255: Differential Equations (Audit)
Math 2568: Linear Algebra
Math 2153: Multivariable Calculus
Math 1151 and 1152: Single Variable Calculus



Statistics

Stat 4202: Inferential Statistics
Stat 4201: Mathematical Statistics
Stat 3470: Introduction to Probability and Statistics for Engineers



Computer Science

CSE 2321: Foundations I: Discrete Structures
CSE 2231: Software II : Software Development and Design
CSE 2221: Software I: Software Components
CSE 1223 : Introduction to Computer Programming in Java



Physics

Physics 2301: Rotation and Relativity
Physics 2300: Intermediate Mechanics
Physics 1251: E&M, Waves, Optics, Modern Physics
Physics 1250: Mechanics, Work and Energy, Thermal Physics

I started writing my notes in latex during lecture since the spring semester of 2025 as a transition to my mathematics and physics degree in collge. They are not so well written because I am still learning to live Latex. You can find them on this notes.farhansadeek.com

title: Farhan Sadeek
text:
Writing
When I was in high school, I took the The Ohio State University courses through through the Academy Program, and I was lucky enough to advice some young students about their transition from high school to college courses. Based on that experience I wrote these two articles. I wil write more as I get more time and experience.

Difference between Computer Science and Programming : For beginners interested in programming and Computer Science and how learn both of those subfields effectively and efficiently.
Learning Physics People who want to study physics.

title: Farhan Sadeek
text:
Miscellaneous
Outside of academics, I enjoy biking, hiking, and running. I am also an avid photographer and a fan of soccer. My favorite team is FC Barcelona. I kept my academic website seperate from my personal website. You can find my personal website here.
